articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: Top moments from Knicks' Game 3 comeback victory - ESPN
articles.description: The Indiana Pacers and New York Knicks faced off in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals on Sunday night.
articles.content: The New York Knicks trailed the Indiana Pacers by four at the end of the first quarter, 13 at the end of the second and 10 at the end of the third. They won 106-100 in Game 3 of the Eastern Conferenc… [+823 chars]

articles.title: Live updates: Kyle Larson’s attempt at Indy 500/Coca-Cola 600 ‘Double’ - NASCAR.com
articles.description: Follow along with live updates as Kyle Larson attempts the "double" by competing in the Indianapolis 500 and the Coca-Cola 600.
articles.content: The biggest day in racing features NASCAR’s Coca-Cola 600 from Charlotte Motor Speedway, the Indianapolis 500 for IndyCar (won by Alex Palou) and the Monaco Grand Prix in F1 (won by Lando Norris). He… [+4242 chars]
